mapper.select:

ORDER BY division DESC, ref DESC, re_step ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ref), 0) + 1 FROM notice_board
INSERT INTO notice_board SET division = #{division}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, regdate = NOW(), fileName = #{fileName}, fileOriName = #{fileOriName}, fileUrl = #{fileUrl}, ref = #{ref}, re_step = 0, re_level = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE aid = #{aid}
